paper_abstract: We use Choquet's integral representation theorem (Choquet, 1954) [5] to derive sigma-additive Mobius transforms for totally monotone capacities nu defined on the Borel sets of a Polish space Omega and having certain continuity properties. Several results in the literature follow as corollaries. (C) 2013 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Countably additive Mobius transforms for belief functions on Polish spaces
